items.sentence: Tom got dressed, ran down the stairs, and went outside to see what was going on.
It saddens me to think that we still haven't done enough to help those children.
We know the other team will win. The only question is how much will they win by.
Tom is hoping he and Mary will be able to spend some time together next weekend.
The bus to the airport leaves from in front of the hotel every hour on the hour.
